organic_results.title: How to Make Money While You Sleep With Affiliate Marketing
organic_results.snippet: Affiliate marketing is a simple 3-step process: You recommend a product or service to your followers. Your followers purchase the product or service using your affiliate link. You get paid a commission for the sales made using your affiliate link.

organic_results.title: How To Make Money Through Affiliate Marketing - App Samurai
organic_results.snippet: What Is Affiliate Marketing. ... There are different affiliate programs that use different payment terms. Pay Per Click (PPC): You make money online based on the number of visitors redirected by your affiliate site to the advertiser's website. Pay Per Sale (PPS): You make money online when the purchase is completed.

organic_results.title: Affiliate Marketing Made Simple: A Step-by-Step Guide
organic_results.snippet: It's based on revenue sharing. If you have a product and want to sell more, you can offer promoters a financial incentive through an affiliate program. If you have no product and want to make money, then you can promote a product that you feel has value and earn an income from it as an affiliate marketer.
